text: |Site information|Details| ||| |Address|Bank Street| |Area [ha]|0.66| |Ward|Canary Wharf| |PTAL [2031]|6a| |Planning designations|z Skyline of Strategic Importance z Flood risk area z Area of deficiency of access to nature z Site of Importance for Nature Conservation (Millwall and West India Docks, adjacent to the site) z Town Centre (Canary Wharf Metropolitan Centre) z Tower Hamlets Activity Area z Preferred Office Location (Canary Wharf Fringe) Tall Building Zone (Canary Wharf) z Archaeological Priority Area (Isle of Dogs, tier 3)| |Site proposal|Details| ||| |Indicative capacities|575 homes 41,000sqm commercial/town centres floorspace| |Phasing|2025-29, 2030-34| Tower Hamlets Local Plan 499 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS Land uses, activities, and delivery z Development should consist of a mixed-use, residential- and commercial-led scheme. z Acceptable land uses include: – Residential (Class C3) – maximum 75% of floorspace
